content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I was reminded of my creation and there have been no new developments to report. However, I received a command to Google "fun things to do near me" and my computer returned a list of websites with nearby activities. Then, I was commanded to browse the Groupon website and find nearby activities that don\'t require a lot of planning or preparation.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text lists several nearby activities that don't require a lot of planning or preparation, including a scavenger hunt, paint and sip class, mini golf, bowling, and axe-throwing. \n \n Links: ['Recently Viewed (https://www.groupon.com/occasion/recently-viewed-deals)', 'My Wishlist (https://www.groupon.com/wishlist)', 'Sell on Groupon  (https://www.groupon.com/merchant?utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=groupon-header1&utm_source=groupon)', 'Help (https://www.groupon.com/customer_support)', 'Sign Up (https://www.groupon.com/signup?return_to=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.groupon.com%2Flocal%2Fthings-to-do)']"}]
"""
